_sText:
Readme File: ka_yavin_arena
February 17 2012
Map Name: ka_yavin_arena
Author: Kyle07
Worktime: almost September 2011 (last final compile was in November 2011)
Contact: http://steamcommunity.com/id/7656196459545639/

Map description:
Remember the Planet Yavin IV from Star Wars? Yeah, I'm not kidding, this map is based on the massassi temples on Yavin IV from Star Wars.
Read for more information please.
This Map is a Port from the Game "Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy", which is running on the Quake III Arena Engine.
It's a Duel-Map, which I created on October 18 2008.
Now I wanted to discover the possibilities of Valve's powerful Source Engine, so I started the quickest possible project, porting an old map from me.
The result is an aztec-themed knife arena map. The Map itself has no changes since the 2008 Version, I added only CS:S-Textures and new light.
The brushes are unedited, so I have to say sorry.
It is planned to port this map one day for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, where I will try to edit every single detail.
An Day of Defeat: Source Version is currently under development with a lot of extras.
I hope you will have fun with my first Counter-Strike Map.

You don't like knife arena? There is also a aim_yavin_arena!
Use google or search on the same site where you found this map here.

The Jedi Academy Version can be found on Filefront:
http://jediknight3.filefront.com/file/Yavin_IV_Jedi_Academy_Trainingroom;95080
=================================================
"Map Information"

Bot Support:	Yes
New Textures:	No (using almost only aztec textures)
New Models:	No
New Sounds:	No
New Music:	No
Game Types:	Knife Arena (ka_*)
Brushes:	86
Entinities:	...
Max Players:	12

Used Programs:

Source SDK


For the Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy Version in 2008 I used also:

GTK Radiant 1.4
pakscape
Paint


How to Install this map:

Extract "ka_yavin_arena.bsp" and "ka_yavin_arena.nav" into your cstrike/maps folder.
This should look like this for example:
E:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\>Your Steam Account Name<\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

I don't know why, but this map doesn't work in Garrys Mod. Any ideas?


My other Map-Project at the moment are:

- Luke's Mission at Cairn Bay: http://www.moddb.com/mods/lukes-mission-at-cairn-bay
- Porting this Map (dod_yavin_arena) for Day of Defeat: Source


If you have any feedback for me or bugs to report, so please write me a comment where you downloaded the map.
Ask me before using this map for your own projects.


Copyright/Permissions:

THIS LEVEL IS NOT MADE, DISTRIBUTED, OR SUPPORTED BY VALVE CORPORATION AND/OR ITS LICENSORS.
